title: I NEED TO REMOVE CHAT FROM MY GAME.
body: How do i REMOVE chat COMPLETELY? I can't help but type into the chat and tell some of my teammates that they suck every once in a while. I just want to completely remove that chat or just make IT UNABLE TO CHAT AT ALL.

replies.body:
Change chat key to a key you never need (like the one between backspace and enter), and then physically remove that key from your keyboard.
Of course, if you have a gaming keyboard, it makes it easy to map that key to do nothing or even to another key, while the game will still be looking for the \ keypress.

There currently isn't a disable chat option.  You can use /mute all to not view chat from anyone or drag the chat box off screen.  Keep in mind that if you do hit enter to chat players can still see it.  You can select to not use chat at all and use smart pings instead to communicate.  Best of luck!

There is no option to disable it,
but you can minimize it to minimum (Options/Interface/Chat Scale) and hide it, so you won't be able to see it :
